rooms.description: The entrance hall serves as a transitional space from the outdoors to the interior. It is designed with Vastu principles in mind by aligning its entrance towards the east for positive energy.
A spacious living area that maximizes natural light through large windows. The layout is designed for social interactions and offers easy access to the balcony.
Modern kitchen with efficient ventilation. Designed in alignment with Vastu by positioning it in the southeast corner for prosperity.
Dedicated space for servants that includes basic living and sleeping facilities. Located conveniently near service areas.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to face the east, following Vastu guidelines for a welcoming energy.

openings.location: attached to living room and bedroom
openings.description: Spacious balconies for each bedroom ensuring natural ventilation and light; designed with modern aesthetics.
Service entrance providing direct access to the servant quarters and storage.

rooms.description: Primary bedroom with an adjoining spacious balcony. Emphasis on natural light through large windows placed strategically to capture morning sun.
Multipurpose studio space for work and relaxation, designed with flexible partitioning and integrated storage solutions.

openings.description: Modern balcony design promoting ventilation and light.
Staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor. Designed for ease of access while ensuring safety with modern railings.

rooms.description: Expansive rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and a relaxing outdoor area. Incorporates greenery and seating zones to enhance natural light and ventilation.

openings.description: Direct access staircase leading from the first floor to the rooftop terrace, designed with safety and modern aesthetics in mind.
